results.description: An explosion erupts from your feet. You take 8d6 fire damage, and all creatures within 10 ft. of you must make a dexterity save or take the same damage (half damage on success).

Roll a wisdom save. On a failure, you become compelled to move to a new location. You must spend your movement on each turn moving away until you are 100 ft. from your starting position or 1 minute passes.

You are enveloped in a thin column of breathable water for 1 minute. Your speed is halved unless you have a &reference[swimming]{Swimming} speed, but you have resistance to acid and bludgeoning damage.
You have a vision of your death. Roll a wisdom saving throw. On failure, take 4d10 psychic damage. On success, you feel prepared and gain 2d10 temporary hit points.
A small raincloud appears above the head of someone you choose within 120 ft. It rains on them for 1 minute. If you can't see anyone, it rains on you.
Your hands and feet become sticky, even through clothing. For 1 hour, you can climb on walls and celings at half your walking speed (or your climb speed).
A floating self-playing instrument with 20 hit points and 15 AC appears next to you, granting you advantage on saving throws while you can hear it. It disappears when destroyed or after 1 minute.
At the end of your turn, you will rapidly ascend up to 100 ft. in the air and remain floating until the start of your next turn, when you teleport harmlessly back to the ground.
A creature of your choice within 90 ft. must make a wisdom save or be goaded by an article of your clothing of your choice for 1 round.
You invent a harmless and mostly useless spell, such as 'Crumple Paper' or Summon Grain of Sand'. You gain inspiration, and gain the spell as an extra 1st level spell.
You can choose to hold out your hand to an ally within 90 ft. If your ally is willing, you switch places with them.
You may spit at a creature within 60 ft. Roll a ranged spell attack. On a hit, target takes 4d8 acid damage.
Your body goes briefly numb. You regain 4d6 hit points.

You summon a dead clam, which comes to life, growing a humanoid body and becoming a 'clambie'. This clambie has the statistics of a zombie but speaks only Clambie (every word sounds like 'hububub'). The clambie is friendly to you and helps you however it can for 7 days.
Your spirit becomes briefly detached from your body, allowing you to feed some of your life essence to others. You can grant as many of your own hit points as you want to a creature within 60 ft.
You regain 5 sorcery points. If you go above your maximum and don't spend the excess points, your sorcery point total will be lowered to your maximum after 1 minute.
After casting your spell, you can choose to immediately cast Prismatic Spray as part of the same action without you requiring to concentrate on it.
Any metamagic options you apply to this spell are free.
